name: Ziran
description:
Created in 2 days during the Winchester Game Jam 2022

Placed in a cold desolate world, explore the barren lands to find elemental towers and bring back colour to the world.

Progress: 1/4 towers implemented

Controls:

- Right click to lock cursor in-game

- WASD to move

- Mouse to look around

Known issues: May lag for a bit on startup
